narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Arizona Behavioral Health Clinic LLC is a Clinic/Center  Rehabilitation  Substance Use Disorder provider based in Scottsdale, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $4.9M in Medicaid payments across 17K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $4.9M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
